sections.content: Intelligent, thoughtful, detail-oriented, critical, and service-driven.
Care for digestion. High-fiber diet, probiotics, stress-reducing exercises.
Express affection through service, seek perfection.
Thrive in science, healthcare, consulting. Must avoid over-caution.
